tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Suriname is known for its cultural diversity, with influences from Indigenous, African, Indian, Javanese, and Dutch heritage, creating a rich tapestry of traditions.

tidbits.title: Biodiversity
tidbits.description: The country's lush rainforests and diverse ecosystems support a wide array of flora and fauna, including unique species like the Surinamese toad and the giant river otter.

tidbits.title: Paramaribo's Historic Center
tidbits.description: Paramaribo, the capital, boasts a UNESCO-listed historic inner city with colonial architecture and culturally significant sites, reflecting Suriname's history.
